name: Introduction to Humanities
description: This course introduces students to the humanities, and includes studies of literary, cultural, and artistic themes from ancient to contemporary times.

name: English Literature I
description: This course covers English literature from the Anglo-Saxon period to the 18th century.

name: English Literature II
description: This course covers English literature from the Romantic period to the present.

name: British and World Literature
description: This course covers the literature of Britain and other countries, including the cultural and historical contexts of the works.
